rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a foyer area, integrated with a modern waiting space.
Luxurious living room with high ceilings and large windows for natural light. Includes a central coffee table and entertainment system.
Elegant dining room with ample seating capacity, overlooking the garden. Aligns with Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, ergonomic layout and integrated pantry. Designed following Vastu guidelines for cleanliness and energy flow.
Functional living space for household staff, featuring a small kitchenette and essential facilities.

openings.description: Grand double entry door made of high-quality materials, ensuring smooth flow and security.
Automated double garage door leading to the two-car garage. Designed for ease of access and security.
Large windows across living spaces, ensuring natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Balcony extending from the living room to the garden, providing an outdoor seating area with view.
Secondary entrance for staff and service vehicles, ensuring smooth operation without disturbing the main living area.
Access door to the utility room and storage space, designed for ease of maintenance.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and panoramic windows.
Spacious bedroom designed for guest use or as a study, with ample storage and light.
Additional bedroom featuring modern design elements and adequate natural lighting.
Guest bathroom with essential facilities, located conveniently near the guest bedroom.

openings.description: Balcony attached to master bedroom offering private outdoor relaxation space.
Large windows throughout the bedrooms to enhance natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Service ladder for quick access between floors during maintenance.

garage_details.design_notes: Two-car garage with modern automated doors and integrated parking space.

additional_features.description: Additional balcony spaces on the living areas for enhanced outdoor connectivity.
Roof deck designed as a relaxation and social area, ensuring privacy and views.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance aligned to the east or north for prosperity and positive energy flow.
Living spaces receive ample natural light from east and south exposures.
Kitchen positioned away from main living areas in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
